text: Lovers and Other Strangers is a 1970 American romantic comedy movie directed by Cy Howard and based on the 1968 play of the same name by Ren√©e Taylor and Joseph Bologna. It stars Beatrice Arthur, Gig Young, Cloris Leachman, Richard S. Castellano, Diane Keaton and Sylvester Stallone and the film was nominated for three Oscars and won one Academy Award in 1971. ==Other websites== * * * * * Category:1970 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:American independent movies Category:1970s English-language movies Category:1970s American drama movies Category:1970 comedy-drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:1970s independent movies Category:Movies about marriage Category:Movies about weddings Category:Movies that won the Best Original Song Academy Award Category:Movies set in New York City
title: Lovers and Other Strangers
